---
title: "Nikon"
description: "PTP Nikon definitions"
---

# Nikon

## LiveViewStatus

**Code:** `0xd1b8`

Indicates the status of live view (ON or OFF)

**Access:** GetSet

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Value:** 0

---

## LiveViewSelector

**Code:** `0xd1a6`

Indicates the state of live view mode (Photo Lv or Video Lv)

**Access:** GetSet

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Value:** 0

---

## MovieRecProhibitionCondition

**Code:** `0xd0a4`

Indicates video recording prohibition conditions (bitfield, 0 = allowed, non-zero = prohibited)

**Access:** Get

**Datatype:** UINT32

**Bit:** 0

---
